summary: This document appears to be a series of timestamped text messages or chat logs from July 10, 2019, between individuals at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, discussing the housing and psychological assessment of Jeffrey Epstein. It references a need for a crisis evaluation (POFU) for Epstein the following day.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate being discussed in the messages; the staff are coordinating his housing and scheduling a psychological crisis evaluation (POFU) for him.

persons.name: Chief Psychologist
persons.context: A staff member at the Metropolitan Correctional Center who is communicating about inmate housing and scheduling a psychological evaluation for Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: The Chief Psychologist is responsible for scheduling a psychological crisis evaluation (POFU) for inmate Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Epstein Housing and Evaluation Discussion
events.description: Staff at the Metropolitan Correctional Center discuss housing Jeffrey Epstein and schedule a psychological crisis evaluation (POFU) for him for the following day.

events.title: Scheduled Crisis Evaluation for Epstein
events.description: A psychological crisis evaluation (POFU) is scheduled to be conducted for Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is a log of communications from July 10, 2019, regarding Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
Staff discuss housing Epstein and schedule a psychological crisis evaluation (referred to as a POFU) for him for the following day, July 11, 2019.
The communications involve a Chief Psychologist from the U.S. Department of Justice/Federal Bureau of Prisons at the facility.
